name: Language Lab (itch)
description:
Quick sketch of a language learning game I'm making. Currently I'm working on mechanics before bringing in the theming. First version is Kanji to English. I'm looking at implementing English to Kanji/Kana as well as a separate mode that focuses on the readings of the Kanji vocabulary.

Right now 59 words are in the program. Considering spaced repetition as a progression system.
